histogram.name: ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.SystemSwitchAudio
histogram.summary: Recorded when the system switches or does not switch {AudioType} audio after device is added or removed. Do not record if there is no alternative available {AudioType} audio device.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.SystemSwitchAudio.{IsChromeRestarts}
histogram.summary: Similar to ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.SystemSwitchAudio but only recorded in cases of {IsChromeRestarts}.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.System{SwitchDecision}Audio.AudioDeviceCount
ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.System{SwitchDecision}Audio.AudioDeviceCount.{IsChromeRestarts}
histogram.summary: Similar to ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.System{SwitchDecision}Audio.AudioDeviceCount but only recorded in cases of {IsChromeRestarts}.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.System{SwitchDecision}Audio.AudioDeviceSet
ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.System{SwitchDecision}Audio.AudioDeviceSet.{IsChromeRestarts}
histogram.summary: Similar to ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.System{SwitchDecision}Audio.AudioDeviceSet but only recorded in cases of {IsChromeRestarts}.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.System{SwitchDecision}Audio.BeforeAndAfterAudioDeviceSet
histogram.summary: Record all the connected audio device types when the system {SwitchDecision} {AudioType} audio after device is added or removed. Record both before and after condition of audio device set. Recorded right after ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.SystemSwitchAudio is recorded.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.System{SwitchDecision}Audio.BeforeAndAfterAudioDeviceSet.{IsChromeRestarts}
histogram.summary: Similar to ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.System{SwitchDecision}Audio.BeforeAndAfterAudioDeviceSet but only recorded in cases of {IsChromeRestarts}.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.AudioSelection.{AudioType}.UserOverrideSystem{SwitchDecision}TimeElapsed
histogram.summary: Recorded when user overrides the {AudioType} audio device selection right after the event of system makes the decision of {SwitchDecision} active audio device. Records the time delta between user overrides and the system decision. The shorter time delta, the more confidence we can conclude that user overrides due to bad system decision.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.DeviceChange
histogram.summary: Recorded when the user changes either the input or output audio device from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page. Not recorded when the audio device is programmatically changed.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.InputDeviceTypeChangedTo
histogram.summary: Records the type of device selected when the user changes the input audio device from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page. Not recorded when the audio device is programmatically changed.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.InputGainSetTo
histogram.summary: Records the input gain set by the user from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page. To account for changes via a UI slider, the histogram is only recorded after the user stops changing the gain for a predetermined amount of seconds.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.InputMuteStateChange
histogram.summary: Recorded when the user changes the input audio mute state from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.NoiseCancellationEnabled
histogram.summary: Recorded when the user enables/disables noise cancellation from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.OutputDeviceTypeChangedTo
histogram.summary: Records the type of device selected when the user changes the output audio device from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page. Not recorded when the audio device is programmatically changed.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.OutputMuteStateChange
histogram.summary: Recorded when the user changes the output audio mute state from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.OutputVolumeSetTo
histogram.summary: Records the output volume set by the user from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page. To account for changes via a UI slider, the histogram is only recorded after the user stops changing the volume for a predetermined amount of seconds.
